name: AnimalSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Animal Sound”
”Alexa, start Animal Sound”
”Alexa, Animal Sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal sound
des:
Animal Sound is a fun sound game which will randomly provide you funny animal sounds. Animal Sound consists of a huge data-set of animal sound and it is updated regularly. 
Just say, "Alexa, start Animal Sound " and Alexa will play any random animal sound.
Please review the skill on the Alexa Skill Store.
